article.title: U.S. Air Force Modifies Radio Frequency Countermeasures Contract
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronic Integration Inc., Nashua, New Hampshire, has been awarded a $67,696,276 modification (P00010) to exercise the option on previously awarded contract FA8540-16-C-0003 for radio frequency countermeasures system design, integration and testing. Work will be performed at Nashua, New Hampshire, and is expected to be complete by August 31, 2023. Fiscal 2017 research, development, test and evaluation funds in the amount of $15,050,000 are being obligated at the time of award. The Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Robins Air Force Base, Georgia, is the contracting activity.
